        public AuthTicket(java.lang.String userName,
          Watch issueTime,
          long duration,
          java.net.InetAddress userIP,
          byte serviceID)
        Create a new AuthTicket.
        Parameters:
        userName -
        issueTime - The time this ticket was issued. The ticket will expire duration minutes from issueTime. CAUTION:: tickets opened in different time zones than they were created in will show the different time zone but not compensate for the offset!!
        duration - The validity period for this ticket in minutes.
        userIP -
        serviceID -
